item.title: I-80 West - Exit 313 Offramp at US-287
item.description: I-80 West Exit 313 Offramp at US-287 in Laramie. Turn right for US-287 North/3rd St. Turn left for US-287 South/Fort Collins (Colorado)/Port of Entry.

item.description: I-80 West Exit 313 Offramp at US-287 in Laramie.

item.description: US-26 West/US-287 North Approaching US-89/US-191 at Moran Junction. Turn right for US-89/US-191/US-287 North to Yellowstone and Jackson Lake. Continue straight for US-26 West/US-191 South/US-89 South to Jackson.

item.title: US-26 West/US-287 North - Togwotee Pass
item.description: Togwotee Pass on US-26 West/US-287 North. Elevation 9544 Feet. Togwotee Pass is on the Continental Divide.

item.description: US-287 North/US-26 West in Dubois. Turn left to continue on US-287 North/US-26 West.

item.description: Distance marker on US-26 West/US-287 North. Distance to Dubois and Teton Park.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 311 and 313
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 311 - WY-130/WY-230/Snowy Range Road. Approaching Exit 313 - US-287/3rd St./Fort Collins (Colorado).

item.title: US-287 South at I-80
item.description: US-287 South/BL-80 East/Bus. US-30 East at I-80 in Rawlins. Use I-80/US-30 West for Rock Springs; I-80/US-30 East/US-287 South for Cheyenne.

item.title: US-287 North - Rawlins
item.description: US-287 North/BL-80/US-30 West - Rawlins. Population 9259. Elevation 6755. Rawlins is the county seat of Carbon County, and is located just east of the Continental Divide.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 215
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 215. BL-80 and Bus. US-30, use Exit 215. This is the eastern end of the Rawlins business loop.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 215
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 215, BL-80/US-287 North/To WY-789/Rawlins. US-287 North leaves I-80 westbound at Exit 215.

item.title: I-80 West - North Platte River
item.description: I-80 west crossing the North Platte River in Carbon County. Milemarker 229.03 in the background.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 228
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 228 - Fort Steele. Use Exit 228 for Fort Steele State Historic Site.

item.title: I-80 West Offramp at US-30/US-287/WY-130/WY-230
item.description: I-80 West offramp (Exit 235) at US-30/US-287/WY-130/WY-230. Use US-30 East/US-287 South to Medicine Bow. Use WY-130/WY-230 East to Saratoga. US-30 West joins I-80 westbound to Granger; US-287 North joins I-80 westbound to Rawlins.

item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North at WY-34 north to Wheatland. Continue on US-30 West/US-287 North to Rawlins.

item.description: US-30 West/US-287 North at WY-34 North in Albany County.

item.description: End WY-28 East at US-287/WY-789 in Fremont County.

item.description: US-287 north at US-40. US-40 joins US-287 north to Limon. Then both highways merge onto I-70 towards Denver. This is the southern end of the High Plains Highway which connects Kit Carson and Julesburg via US-40 and US-385.

item.description: US-287 north approaching US-40. Use US-40 east for Cheyenne Wells; use US-40 west/US-287 north for Kit Carson.
